Sten Holmberg

Software engineer with over 7 years of experience, passionate about end-to-end development and delivering solutions that users value. With a collaborative mindset and a focus on practical results, I thrive on contributing to seamless workflows and impactful applications.

  • Conceived, designed, and implemented Carpenter, a React application for setting up payment scenarios and simulating card payments, improving testing efficiency and delivery speed.
